SUMMARY: Andrew Cuomo is speaking with allies about possibly running against New York Gov. Kathy Hochul. Democratic Party officials scoff at the idea.

TITLE: Biden details new aid to Ukraine, promises "more in the days and weeks ahead" to help combat Russia invasion
SUMMARY: President Joe Biden condemned Russian leader Vladimir Putin for inflicting "appalling devastation" on Ukraine.

TITLE: Russia claims to have ordered crucial bond payment as it seeks to avoid historic debt default
SUMMARY: The payment on the two eurobond coupons is a key test for Russia.

TITLE: Russia makes some debt payments in dollars, report says, as it seeks to avoid historic debt default
SUMMARY: The payment on the two eurobond coupons is a key test for Russia.

TITLE: Here's what Chinese state media is saying ahead of Xi's call with Biden
SUMMARY: While Chinese state media have tacked away from primarily pro-Russian coverage of the war with Ukraine, one of the consistent messages remains: Blame the U.S.

TITLE: How the Russia-Ukraine war could hit China's trade
SUMMARY: China's trade surplus could narrow to $238 billion this year – about 35% of the historic $676 billion attained last year, according to ANZ Research estimates.

TITLE: U.S. officials continue to press Russia for access to WNBA star Brittney Griner
SUMMARY: A person close to the situation confirmed to NBC News that Griner was "OK" and that her Russian legal team has met with her.

TITLE: Biden warns Xi of global backlash if China helps Russia's attack on Ukraine
SUMMARY: Biden and Chinese Pres. Xi Jinping agreed to work for peace in Ukraine. But China refused to say Russia was responsible for its brutal invasion of the country.
